name: Event Registration
description: Seamless event registration with options to purchase tickets and receive e-tickets.

name: Live Streaming
description: Live streaming services for tech and gaming events, providing remote access and interactive experiences.

name: Event Promotion
description: Promotional services for event organizers, including event listings, marketing campaigns, and sponsorships.

name: Community Forums
description: Online platform for gamers and tech enthusiasts to discuss topics, share experiences, and seek advice.

name: Content Creation
description: Content creation services including video production, photography, and live reporting for tech and gaming events.

name: Gaming Tournaments
description: Organized gaming tournaments, both online and offline, with registration, brackets, and live streaming.
